title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes         Welcome to Katmai National Park sign on Naknek Lake beach. Photo by Mary Kay Hamel  No entrance fees are charged for Katmai National Park and Preserve. Fees are charged for camping in the Brooks Camp Campground, to stay in Fure’s Cabin, and for commercial filming.  Current year reservations for the Brooks Camp Campground and Fure’s Cabin can be made starting January 5 at 8 a.m. AKST (12 p.m. EST). Visit www.recreation.gov or call 1-877-444-6777 to make a reservation.
